body: $PQEFF

$PQEFF I found this resource that answered a lot of my questions about this takeover bid (Link below). First Viston CANNOT accelerate the bid unless PQE to a shorter timeline (which wouldn‚Äôt happen if they don‚Äôt recommend the bid) OR if PQE announces it enters into an alternative transaction (such as agreement between PQE and Viston
created_at: a rights offering etc.) so my interpretation from yesterday stands corrected. Other interesting things to note:

body: In Canada the take-over bid can only be cash (not subject to financing) which was one of the ‚Äúselling points‚Äù of Viston‚Äôs offer.
PQE must provide independent valuation of their shares (part of the due diligence of the board of PQE)
Very interesting wording about the ‚ÄúSecond Step Transcation‚Äù which could come into play for those who hold out and do not tender their shares:
https://www.bennettjones.com/-/media/Files/BennettJones/Publications/Bennett-Jones--Public-Mergers-and-Acquisition-In-Canada--2nd-Edition-62Page.pdf
